1.0.0.name: wordpress/tnx-simple-widget
1.0.0.description: This is a simple widget to show your TNX links at the sidebar. The TNX code is already included, so you just have to change the username. There are 2 versions of this plugin, with bullet point list and no bullet point list. The one that you using right now is bullet point list. For more details, you can visit the plugin homepage.
